header.title: Dithulusi tsa Salatiso OHS
intro.title: Polokeho ya Kago
intro.description: Netefatsa go obediwa ga melao ya bophelo le polokeho ya kago ka dithulusi tsa Salatiso OHS. Dithuso tsa rona di go thusa go laola dikotsi, go obediwa ga melao, le go sireletsa badiri mo saeteng, ka go dirisa mekgwa e e botoka e e tlhaloseditsweng mo "Polokeho Pele: Ditlhokego tsa Dithulaganyo tsa OHS."
intro.download_link: Tsamaisa Thulaganyo ya OHS ya Kago: Tobetsa Fano
legal_obligations.client.title: Boikarabello jwa Moreki
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(a): Itokisetsa Tlhahlobo ya Kotsi ya Motheo (BRA) e e tlhalosang dikotsi tsa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(b): Fana ka Tlhaloso ya Bophelo & Polokeho e e tlhalosang ditlhokego tse di kgethegileng tsa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(l): Amogela Thulaganyo ya Bophelo & Polokeho ya Mokontiraka pele mosebetsi o simolola.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Boikarabello jwa Mokontiraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(a): Theha Thulaganyo ya Bophelo & Polokeho e e theilweng mo tlhalosong ya moreki.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ya Bophelo & Polokeho mo saeteng e nang le dipampiri tse di tlhokegang kaofela.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Molao wa Kago 9: Dira Tlhahlobo ya Kotsi le go Tlhalosa Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokgwa o kgethegileng.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Boikarabello jwa Setsebi sa H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Molao wa Kago 5(5): Baemedi (PrCHSA) ba laola H&S ka lebitso la moreki, ba netefatsa go obediwa.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Molao wa Kago 8(5): Ditlhankana (CHSO) di thusa Bakontiraka go kenya tshebetsong le go lekola dithulaganyo tsa H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Melao ya SACPCMP: Ba tshwanetse go boloka ngodiso le ditlhokego tsa CPD tsa maemo a setsebi.

cart.title: Sekhwama sa Gago

resources.title: Itlhaganela le Ditsebi tsa H&S tse di Amogetsweng
resources.description: O batla thuso ya setsebi? Itlhaganela le ditsebi tse di amogetsweng ka ditlhokego tsa projeke ya gago.

footer.newsletter.title: Dula o na le Ditlhong
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Go Obiwa ga OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Simolola ka go kgetha tirelo go netefatsa go obediwa ga Molao wa Bophelo le Polokeho mo Tirong.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: A o tseba gore dipampiri tsa OHS tse di nepagetseng di ka fokotsa ditiragalo tsa mo tirong ka 30%? A re simolole!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_1.description: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(b) o tlhoka Tlhaloso ya Bophelo le Polokeho ya diprojeke tsohle, mme 7(1)(b) e tlhoka Faele ya H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Tlhaloso e e Tsepameng ya H&S e ka fokotsa dikotsi ka 30%! E tshwana le setlhako sa polokeho sa projeke ya gago.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_2.description: Molao wa Kago 5: Bareki ba tshwanetse go fana ka Tlhaloso ya Bophelo & Polokeho le go netefatsa go obediwa ke bakontiraka.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Bareki ba ba bolokang ngodiso ya COIDA ba ka itlhokomolosa dikotlo tse kgolo—boloka nomoro eo kgauswi!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_3.description: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(a): Bakontiraka ba tshwanetse go theha Thulaganyo ya Bophelo & Polokeho e e theilweng mo tlhalosong ya moreki.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Go thopa mokontiraka ka potlako go ka potlakisa go obediwa—tiragatso ya setlhopa e dira gore toro ya polokeho e dire!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_4.description: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(b): Bakontiraka ba tshwanetse go boloka Faele ya Bophelo & Polokeho mo saeteng e nang le dipampiri tsohle tse di tlhokegang.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Go nna le ditlhong tsa go itlhaganela le yena tsa mokontiraka tse di siameng go ka boloka letsatsi ka nako ya tshoganyetso—dula o itlhaganele!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_5.description: Molao wa Kago 3(1): Tumello e a tlhokega mo diprojeke tse di fetang R40,000 kgotsa tse di tshwereng matsatsi a a fetang 180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Aterese tsa saete tse di hlalang di thusa ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso go go fitlha ka potlako—se ke wa letla phoso ya go kwala go sitisa thuso!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_6.description: Molao wa Kago 9: Tlhahlobo ya Kotsi le go Tlhalosa Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokgwa o kgethegileng e a tlhokega mo ditsamaisong tsotlhe.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Go lemoga ditsamaiso tse di kotsi kapele go ka fokotsa dikotsi ka 25%—e tshwana le go fa projeke ya gago matla a polokeho!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_7.description: Melao ya SACPCMP: CHSO le PrCHSA ba tshwanetse go boloka ngodiso le ditlhokego tsa CPD go netefatsa go obediwa.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Setsebi sa SACPCMP se se ngodisitsweng se ka fokotsa dikotsi tsa molao thata—MVP ya polokeho ya projeke ya gago!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_8.description: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(l): Bareki ba tshwanetse go amogela thulaganyo ya H&S ya mokontiraka pele mosebetsi o simolola.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Boikarabello jo bo hlalang mo dipampiring bo ka oketsa go hlaka ga projeke—motho mongwe le mongwe o tseba seemo sa gagwe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_9.description: Molao wa Bophelo le Polokeho mo Tirong: Dipampiri tse di nepagetseng di netefatsa go obediwa le go sireletsa botlhe ba ba amegang.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Tlhagiso e e Kgatlhisang: Sekhwama sa gago ke sethulusi sa gago sa polokeho—pampiri e e nngwe le e nngwe e o e oketsang e dira gore projeke ya gago e nne le polokeho e e kwa godimo!
